node.context:
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd">
<html>
<head>
	<title>[% $$NODE{title}; %]@Everything2.com</title>
	<link rel='stylesheet' id='basesheet' type='text/css' href='/node/stylesheet/basesheet?displaytype=view'>
[%
if (exists(($$VARS{userstyle})) and defined(($$VARS{userstyle})) && length($$VARS{userstyle})) {
	return '	<link rel="stylesheet" id="zensheet" type="text/css" href="/?node_id=' . $$VARS{userstyle}. '&displaytype=view">' ;
}
else {	# default
	return '	<link rel="stylesheet" id="zensheet" type="text/css" href="/node/stylesheet/Kernel+Blue?displaytype=view">';
}
%][%

if (exists(($$VARS{customstyle})) && defined(($$VARS{customstyle}))) {
	return '
	<style type="text/css">
' . htmlScreen($$VARS{customstyle}) . '
	</style>' ;
}
%][%

return '
	<base href="http://' . $CONFIG{canonical_web_server} . '">' if $$USER{ user_id } == $HTMLVARS{ guest_user } ;

%]
[%
my $url = 'http://'.$1 if $ENV{HTTP_HOST} =~ /.+\.($CONFIG{canonical_web_server})(?::\d+)/ ;
$url .= urlGenNoParams( $NODE , 'noQuotes' ) unless $$NODE{ node_id } eq $HTMLVARS{ default_node } ;
$url ||= '/' ;
return '	<link rel="canonical" href="' . $url . '">' ;

%][%

return unless ($$NODE{type_nodetype}==116||$$NODE{node_id}==1140332||$$NODE{node_id}==668164); # e2nodes, 'Findings:', 'Nothing Found'
return if $$NODE{group} and int( @{ $$NODE{group} } ); #e2node, not nodeshell
return '
	<meta name="robots" content="noindex, follow">'; # Google still seems to index these pages.

%]
	<meta name="wisdom" content="Monkey! Bat! Robot Hat!">
	<link rel="icon" href="/favicon.ico" type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon">
	<!--[if lt IE 8]><link rel="shortcut icon" href="/favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon"><![endif]-->
[%
if ($$NODE{title} eq "Cool Archive") {
    return '	<link rel="alternate" type="application/atom+xml" title="Everything2 Cool Archive" href="/node/ticker/Cool+Archive+Atom+Feed'
	. ( $query->param('cooluser') ? '?foruser='.$query->param('cooluser') : '' ) . '">';
}
else {
	return '	<link rel="alternate" type="application/atom+xml" title="Everything2 New Writeups" href="/node/ticker/New+Writeups+Atom+Feed'
	. ( $$NODE{type_nodetype}==15 ? '?foruser='.$$NODE{title} : '' ) . '">';
}
%]
	<script type='text/javascript'>
		var isZen = 1;
	</script>

<script src="/js/protoculous.js" type="text/javascript" ></script> 
	<script src="/stars/jquery.js" type="text/javascript"></script> 
	<script src="/stars/jquery.MetaData.js" type="text/javascript"></script> 
	<script src='/node/jscript/star+script' type='text/javascript'></script> 
	<script type='text/javascript'> 
		jQuery.noConflict();
	</script> 
 
	<script src="/js/tiny_mce/tiny_mce.js" type="text/javascript" ></script> 
	<script src='/title/Javascript%20Compiler?page_id=891793' type='text/javascript' ></script> 

</head>

<body class="[%
my $str = 'writeuppage ' if $$NODE{ type_nodetype } eq 116 || $$NODE{ type_nodetype } eq 117 ;
return $str.$$NODE{type}{title} unless $$NODE{ type_nodetype } eq 14 ;
#superdocs further identified by title
my $id .= ( $$NODE{ node_id } != 124 ? lc( $$NODE{ 'title' } ) : 'frontpage' ) ;
$id =~ s/\W//g ;
'superdoc" id="'.$id ;
%]">
CONTAINED_STUFF
<script src="http://www.google-analytics.com/urchin.js" type="text/javascript">
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
_uacct = "UA-1314738-1";
urchinTracker();
</script>
</body>
</html>
node.title: e3 stdcontainer
